import java.util.Scanner;

public class e {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		Scanner s = new Scanner(System.in);
		int scene = s.nextInt();
		int act = s.nextInt();
		int[] scenes = new int[scene];
		int[] max = new int[act];
		int maxi = 0;
		int excite = 0;
		
		for(int i = 0; i<scene; i++)
		{
			scenes[i] = s.nextInt();
		}
		
		for(int i = 0; i< act; i++)
		{
			for(int j = 0; j<scene; j++)
			{
				if(scenes[maxi]< scenes[j])
				{
					maxi = j;
					
				}
			}
			
			max[i] = scenes[maxi];
			scenes[maxi] = -1;

		}
		
		for(int i = 0; i< max.length; i++)
		{
			excite = excite+ max[i];
			
		}
		
		System.out.println(excite);
		
		
	}

}
